qx_text: In general, how is your balance when standing?
answer_options: Very good. I never or rarely lose my balance
Good. I sometimes lose my balance or sway when my eyes are closed
Poor. I often lose my balance or sway, even when my eyes are open
Very poor. I always or almost always lose my balance
answer_text: Very poor. I always or almost always lose my balance

qx_text: In general, how is your balance when walking a straight line?
answer_options: I can easily walk a straight line
I occasionally lose my balance
I usually have to concentrate to keep my balance
I lose my balance after a few steps
I need help to hold my balance

qx_text: In general, how is your balance when sitting?
answer_options: I am very steady when I sit
I sway once in a while when I sit
I sway constantly when I sit but I never need support
I sometimes need support when I sit to keep from swaying
I usually need support when I sit to keep from swaying

qx_text: Your arm(s)
answer_options: I do not have tremors or coordination problems
Rarely make it hard for me to use
Sometimes make it hard for me to use
Often make it hard for me to use
Always make it hard for me to use
answer_text: Rarely make it hard for me to use

answer_options: I do not have tremors or coordination problems

answer_options: I do not have muscle weakness in my face
A little, such as when I furrow my eyebrows or laugh
A lot, such as trouble with drooling or when closing my eye(s)
Total weakness or palsy, such as Bell's palsy
answer_text: A little, such as when I furrow my eyebrows or laugh

answer_options: I do not have muscle weakness in my face

Feeling is poor. Mild pain

answer_options: Feeling is very good. No numbness or pain

qx_text: On an average day, which of the following describes your fatigue?
answer_options: I experience NO fatigue

I experience mild fatigue.
 I do feel the need to rest more often, but I can still complete all my daily tasks
Due to my fatigue I have to rest unusually often. This affects less than half of my daily activities. I often cannot complete my daily routine without naps or significant rest
I experience severe fatigue levels that have overtaken my life. I am unable to complete more than half of my daily tasks
answer_text: Due to my fatigue I have to rest unusually often. This affects less than half of my daily activities. I often cannot complete my daily routine without naps or significant rest

qx_text: In general, how often do you wake up feeling rested in the morning?
answer_options: All of the time
Most of the time
A good bit of the time
Some of the time
A little of the time
None of the time
answer_text: Most of the time

qx_text: How far can you walk without needing to use an aid (cane, crutch, walker)?
answer_options: More than 1500 feet (500 meters or about 5 football fields)
About 900 to 1500 feet (300 meters or about 3 football fields)
About 600 to 900 feet (200 meters or about 2 football fields)
About 300 to 600 feet (100 meters or about 1 football field)
Less than 300 feet
answer_text: Less than 300 feet

qx_text: When you use an aid (cane, crutch, walker), you can walk:
answer_options: About 300 feet or 100 meters
About 60 feet or 20 meters
About 24 feet or 8 meters
answer_text: About 60 feet or 20 meters

qx_text: Walk without aid?
Use a cane, a single crutch, or hold onto another person?
Use a walker or other bilateral support?
Use a wheel chair?
Which of the following best describes your functional abilities?
answer_options: I am able to carry out my usual daily activities without limitation
I have limitations but can carry out most of my usual daily activities, even if I may require some special provisions such as altered work hours or naps
I am able to carry out about only half of my usual daily activities even with special provisions
I am severely limited in my ability to carry out my usual daily activities
I require assistance with even my basic self care activities such as dressing, bathing, transferring and going to the bathroom
answer_text: I am able to carry out about only half of my usual daily activities even with special provisions

qx_text: Problems with vision in your right eye
answer_options: I have no problems with my ability to see
My vision is slightly impaired
My vision is very impaired
I am blind, or almost blind, in that eye

qx_text: Problems with vision in your left eye
answer_options: I have no problems with my ability to see
My vision is slightly impaired
My vision is very impaired
I am blind, or almost blind, in that eye

qx_text: Do you have blind spots in your vision?
answer_options: I do NOT have any blind spots in my vision
My doctor has told me I have a blind spot but I do not notice it
Yes, I notice a blind spot in my vision
answer_text: I do NOT have any blind spots in my vision

qx_text: Do you have double vision?
answer_options: I do NOT have any double vision
I have double vision that comes and goes
I almost always have double vision that goes away when one eye is closed
I have complete loss of eye movement when I look in one or more directions (one or both eyes)
answer_text: I have double vision that comes and goes

qx_text: Do you have any problems with your hearing?
answer_options: I do NOT have problems hearing
I have mild hearing loss on one side
I have moderate or severe hearing loss on one side
I have total hearing loss on both sides. I am effectively deaf
answer_text: I have mild hearing loss on one side

qx_text: In general, how is your ability to speak?
answer_options: I do NOT have problems speaking
I sometimes slur words but others don't seem to notice
I often slur words and others notice
I slur words so much that it interferes with my ability to have conversations
I slur my words so much that others cannot understand me
I cannot speak
answer_text: I do NOT have problems speaking

qx_text: For an average day, check the one answer that best describes your ability to swallow liquids and solids.
answer_options: I do NOT have any problems swallowing liquids or foods
I have problems swallowing liquids or solid foods
I have frequent problems with swallowing and need a pureed diet
I cannot swallow food or liquids
answer_text: I have frequent problems with swallowing and need a pureed diet

qx_text: Constipation
answer_options: No constipation
Some constipation
Constipation so severe that I cannot move my bowels without an enema or manual measure

answer_options: Normal
Mild frequency
I need to be close to the bathroom at all times and/or wear pads
I am not able to control my bowels
answer_text: Normal

qx_text: How often did you have a sudden and uncomfortable feeling that you had to urinate soon ("urgency")?
answer_options: Never or rarely
About once a week
A few times a week
Every day
Several times a day
answer_text: Several times a day

qx_text: How often did you leak urine without meaning to, even a small amount?
answer_options: Never or rarely
A few times
About once a week
A few times a week to every day
Several times a day
answer_text: A few times a week to every day

qx_text: Do you wear a pad for your bladder problems or use a urinal?
answer_options: No
Yes
answer_text: Yes

qx_text: On an average day, how easy it is for you to start urinating?
answer_options: I do NOT have trouble with starting to urinate
I sometimes have trouble starting to urinate
I often have trouble starting to urinate, and/or experience frequent urinary tract infections
My difficulty urinating is so severe that I require intermittent catheterization
My difficulty urinating is so severe that I require an indwelling catheter

My retention is so severe that my bladder lets out unexpectedly,
 even when I don't feel the urge to urinate ("overflow incontinence")
answer_text: I sometimes have trouble starting to urinate

qx_text: On an average day, which of the following best describes your cognitive (thinking) ability?
answer_options: I have NO problems with concentration or memory
I have some concentration and memory problems, or problems with coping with stress. But I am able to handle my daily routines including completing this survey
I have problems with concentration and memory that my friends and family notice. This is beginning to affect my daily routine. It makes completing this survey difficult
I have severe impairment in my cognitive thinking abilities. For example, I sometimes forget where I am and who I am talking to. I need help completing this survey
I have no meaningful conversation and am unable to handle my affairs because of my severe cognitive problems. I need someone else to complete this survey
answer_text: I have no meaningful conversation and am unable to handle my affairs because of my severe cognitive problems. I need someone else to complete this survey

answer_options: Not at all
